snippet.textDisplay: Colonial Cousins watershed moment in modern  Indian music. I still can't forget the smell on my first  Colonial cousins cassttee in 1996. The music still cherish my teen memories and music from them to come till Aatma.

snippet.textDisplay:
Hariharan might be the only reason for whom u can attempt to listen this song... Awesome singing by Hariharan.. Guess MTV should hand over the composition work to someone else with fresh initiatives and creativity... Its almost like all the songs in CS @ MTV India sounds similar... its just not unto the standards... 
Guess it would be better if they could take some cue from CS pakistan... it really is refreshing.. Hopefully next season if they decide to go with has better song compositions...
snippet.textOriginal:
Hariharan might be the only reason for whom u can attempt to listen this song... Awesome singing by Hariharan.. Guess MTV should hand over the composition work to someone else with fresh initiatives and creativity... Its almost like all the songs in CS @ MTV India sounds similar... its just not unto the standards... 
Guess it would be better if they could take some cue from CS pakistan... it really is refreshing.. Hopefully next season if they decide to go with has better song compositions...
